Name: Eternal Grudge
DevDescription: KOâ€™s self, inflicts Grudge on the opponent. Halves ATK and SpATK.

Name: Infernal Flame
DevDescription: Deals damage, 30% chance of inflicting Burn. Burn can stack up to 3 times (1st, 2nd, 3rd degree). Each stack of burn increases damage over time, from 1/16 to 1/8 to 1/4.

Name: Wither Away
DevDescription: Deals damage and then inflicts Panic on both parties. Panic drains 1 stamina at end of turn for a max of 3 turns.

Name: Osteoporosis
DevDescription: Deals damage.

Name: Rock Pull
DevDescription: If the opposing Mon is attempting to switch out, deals damage heavy damage. Otherwise, deals damage to Gorillax.

Name: Pound Ground
DevDescription: Deals damage.

Name: Blow
DevDescription: Deals damage.

Name: Throw Pebble
DevDescription: Deals damage.

Name: Baselight
DevDescription: Power and Stamina go up each time, up to a cap of 5. Power grows: 80/100/120/140/160. Stamina cost grows: 1/2/3/4/5

Name: Loop
DevDescription: Restores all Stamina to full.

Name: First Resort
DevDescription: Deals damage, if Baselight is at least 2, has +1 priority.

Name: Brightback
DevDescription: Deals damage, if Baselight is at least 2, heal for 50% of damage dealt.

Name: Chain Expansion
DevDescription: Sets up long-lasting battlefield effect. Triggers on switch in for both opponent and self. Damages opponent and heals self for 1/8 of max HP. Lasts for 3-5 turns.

Name: Initialize
DevDescription: Boosts ATK/SpATK by 50%. Can only be used once each time Inutia is sent out. When Inutia switches out, half of the bonus is transferred to the next incoming mon.

Name: Big Bite
DevDescription: Deals damage.

Name: Shrine Strike
DevDescription: Deals damage, heals for 1/16 of max HP.

Name: Triple Think
DevDescription: Boosts SpATK by 75%.

Name: Federal Investigation
DevDescription: Deals damage.

Name: Negative Thoughts
DevDescription: Deals damage, 10% chance to cause Panic.

Name: Infinite Love
DevDescription: Deals damage, 10% chance to cause Sleep.

Name: Chill Out
DevDescription: Inflicts Frostbite. Frostbite deals 1/16 damage every turn, and also halves SpATK.

Name: Deadlift
DevDescription: Increases ATK and DEF by 50%.

Name: Deep Freeze
DevDescription: If the target has Frostbite, consumes Frostbite and does double damage.

Name: Pistol Squat
DevDescription: Deals damage, forces enemy mon to switch.

Name: Gachachacha
DevDescription: Uniformly random power from 0 to 200. 5% chance to auto-KO self, 5% chance to auto-KO opponent.

Name: Guest Feature
DevDescription: Attack Type is set to be the first Type of another selected party member.

Name: Unexpected Carrot
DevDescription: Deals damage.

Name: Snack Break
DevDescription: Heal for 1/2 of health. Effectiveness reduces by half each time, until a min of 1/16.

Name: Electrocute
DevDescription: Deals damage, 10% chance to cause Zap. A Zapped mon skips its next turn.

Name: Round Trip
DevDescription: Deals damage, then switches out.

Name: Mega Star Blast
DevDescription: +2 priority. If used during Storm, clears Storm and accuracy is 100%. Otherwise accuracy is 50%. Deals damage, 30% chance to cause Zap.

Name: Dual Shock
DevDescription: Deals damage and inflicts Zap on self.

Name: Honey Bribe
DevDescription: Heals both self and opponent by 1/2 of max HP. (Each subsequent use cuts HP healed in half). Lowers opponent SpDEF by 50%.

Name: Set Ablaze
DevDescription: Deals damage, 30% chance of Burn.

Name: Heat Beacon
DevDescription: +1 priority to next turn's move. Inflict Burn on the opposing mon.

Name: Q5
DevDescription: Deals damage in 5 turns and Burns the enemy.
